page.name: Bare Metal Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Bare Metal Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Bare Metal Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Bare Metal Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [Global][Additionnal services] - End of Life - RTM package
incidents.message:
Since March 30, 2022, the service for displaying data related to your server activity has been deprecated. 
The service stopped working for servers that already had it installed until June 30, 2022. 
After that date, we discontinued the feature, so server activity data is no longer displayed. 
However, this will not affect the operation of servers that have already installed the service.
